trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There were 2 other sightings in Indianapolis on or around July 7th 2008
Summary: My son and I saw a huge cylinder shape ufo about amile away from us right above the tree line.
divs: Sighting DetailsOn the morning of the sighting we were in a rural area of indiana... my son and I were headed east in my vehicle on Carrol road when I spotted a cylinder shape ufo looked like a fuselage of a plane(no wings) above the tree line about a mile away from us. It was huge! There was no sound! It looked very metalic... reflected the sun light.. standing still, no noise. I turned the car around to get a better look... and it started to move slowly... and then it just disappeared! When I got home I called the Indianapolis airport authority, FBI, Mt Comfort airport , Indiana State police..... there had not been any other reports made. I still can not figure out what I saw.... but what ever it was it was real close to us and I felt very strange afterwards.
